subject: [sugar] Launching Project AmiGO
body:
Hi,Today we have launched project AMiGO,  after some work we have develop an interface for programming the robot, which runs on sugar-jhbuild, including the extra libraries (pyusb);  the next days, we start to post the design pictures and more info, check on:
http://www.cosperu.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=blogcategory&id=30&Itemid=65
-- --------------------------------Alfonso de la Guarda        ICTEC SAC  www.cosperu.comwww.delaguarda.infoTelef. 97550914
          4726906
